reporter_caption.center: AUBURN N. ELEC. R.R. v. LEHIGH N.Y. R.R., 122 App. Div. 900 (1907)

caption.center: Auburn and Northern Electric Railroad Company, Respondent, v. Lehigh and
New York Railroad Company and Lehigh Valley Railroad Company, Appellants.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Orders modified in accordance with memorandum filed with the clerk, and as so modified affirmed, without costs of this appeal to either party.
